channel.title: Is it possible to play a private server on a Mac OS?
channel.description:
It's a simple question, but i am unsure if it is actually possible to play a private server (using the server's custom client) on a Mac OS.
It is possible to download the server and extract, i have gotten thus far, but when i go to the run.bat, it says that i do not have an application that is able to run this.
Is there a solution to this problem, or can i simply not play private servers on a mac.
